column5: Great times can be had here at Fun in the Sun Texas. Boasting two large living areas both with T.V.s and 1 has a dry Bar. Large open spaces for your family to enjoy with formal and casual dining areas. Large out door area with new pool, BBQ & fire table. Newly cemented patio for a larger lounging area. Picnic table, umbrella table and tall bar table located outside.
column8: Good times can be had at Fun in the Sun Texas!
